channel.title: No-ip help please!
channel.description: Ok i had a hamachi network(s) for a long time and im ready to set up a no-ip im registered and made a domain with my name and internet ip but i think i didnt do it right can someone give me a step by step guide ill give the person who gets it to work gets admin on my server with construction marriage and much much more

item.title: No-ip help please!
item.dc:creator: @I_4nthrax_I I 4nthrax I
item.description:
@I_4nthrax_I wrote:

For all of those who need help with No-ip hosting!..

I am not really big to this but i can host no-ip so…

First of all you need to download a server to host! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,72393.0.html
And find any server that you find suitable for you! Now that we have downloaded a server, we can open up our folder to get the server working right click the compiler and change it to:
Code:@echo off
title rapeScape Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server
pausenote:Change the java to what yours is…

Now open up your "run server.bat and change it to:
Code:@echo off
title p00nscape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
note:Change the java to what yours is…

I do not use my compiler or my runserver i use a runserver&compiler:

Code:@echo off
COLOR 0c
title Narbscape Compile + Run
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java” server
pause

Now that our compilers are working your server is ready for updating but now to do no-ip, First of all we need a domain, you can pay or you can get one for free, go to www.no-ip.com and register, now that we have registered we can login and go to “manage” on the left hand side of our screen and click “add a host” now we can pick a server name and what ip we want! if an ip is already taken then don’t moan lol.
Now go to downloads and download no-ip DUC and then it will update your no-ip host so you can host it!

We have a perfect server, a perfect no-ip host, BUT WAIT now we need no-ip to work, go to your start panel and right click “my computer” and click “properties” Now at the top you will see loads of tabs, click “advanced” Then at the bottem of this tab you will see “enviroment variables” click this.

Now on the first box click “new” and add this for the variable name use “Code:CLASSPATH” and for the variable value use “Code:Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.” now that box is done we need to do the other box! they are not the same but the variables are, for the name click “CLASSPATH” for the value click
“Code:.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\lib\ext\QTJava.zip” now put your server on, And if it doesn’t work then your computer is a cookie head.
If this does not help u what will =P I did not make this up some1 else but this helped me alot…

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip help please!
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Step #1:
Go to no-ip.com

Step #2:
Login/Register an account.

Step #3:
Click Your No-IP

Step#4:
Select hosts/redirects.

Step #5:
Select “Add”

You should see this:

Step #6: [entering the information]
For:

Type in the desired name of your server in the above box.

Next:

Select what you would like the last part of your server name to be.

Then:

Type your Internet IP address found at ipchicken.com

After that:

Leave everything blank.

Step #7:
Allow 5 minutes for the updates to take effect

Read full topic
